name: Swades AI
headline: Applied AI Research Lab
description:
Swades AI is an AI research lab building commercial applications using breakthrough AI models. We leverage both open/closed source models to solve application level problems.

Our family of startups include:

OpenMic (https://www.openmic.ai/) : AI phone agents that can do both inbound/outbound calls across different use-cases such as healthcare, logistics & trucking, sales automation etc.

SNR Audio (https://www.snr.audio/) : TTS/STT API at 1/10 the cost of existing providers.

Poolcompute (https://www.poolcompute.com/): GPU marketplace for both centralized/decentralized GPUs at lowest costs

Optic Intellect (https://www.opticintellect.com/) : Large vision models for computer vision tasks

Joinarena.ai (https://www.joinarena.ai/) : AI interviewer for screening calls

Powerdialer.ai (https://www.powerdialer.ai/): Cold calling Sales automation tool

Codesama (https://www.codesama.com/): AI powered github code reviews

founders.name: Kaushik Tiwari, Founder
founders.description: Thiel Fellow & Columbia Grad. I have worked in digital health, insurtech, fintech and AI.

founders.name: Saumik Tiwari, Founder
founders.description: Faced medical debt as a student-athlete. Now, building new financial products for the 99%. Previously, @dormroomfund @trinitycollege

generated_description:
Swades AI is an ambitious startup founded in 2023, operating out of New York, and is part of Y Combinator's Winter 2022 batch. The name "Swades," which means "homeland" in Hindi, aptly reflects its mission: to harness cutting-edge artificial intelligence for practical, real-world applications.

At its core, Swades AI functions as an Applied AI Research Lab. The team of five is focused on building commercial applications using breakthrough AI models, drawing from both open and closed-source technologies to tackle application-level challenges.

Swades AI has an ecosystem of startups, each targeting various facets of AI and business efficiency:

1. **[OpenMic](https://www.openmic.ai/)**: AI-powered phone agents designed for both inbound and outbound calls across industries like healthcare and logistics.
   
2. **[SNR Audio](https://www.snr.audio/)**: Offers Text-to-Speech (TTS) and Speech-to-Text (STT) services at a fraction of the cost of existing providers, making these technologies more accessible.

3. **[Poolcompute](https://www.poolcompute.com/)**: A marketplace for GPU resources, connecting users with centralized and decentralized GPU options for maximum cost-efficiency.

4. **[Optic Intellect](https://www.opticintellect.com/)**: Develops large vision models aimed at enhancing computer vision tasks, enabling rapid deployment with minimal data preparation.

5. **[Joinarena.ai](https://www.joinarena.ai/)**: Functions as an AI interviewer, streamlining screening processes.

6. **[Powerdialer.ai](https://www.powerdialer.ai/)**: Specializes in automating cold calling sales processes.

7. **[Codesama](https://www.codesama.com/)**: Provides AI-powered code review solutions for developers leveraging GitHub.

Swades AI is co-founded by Kaushik and Saumik Tiwari, both of whom have a background in investing and entrepreneurship. Under their leadership, the company is carving a niche in applied AI, with several products aiming to make advanced technologies accessible to traditional businesses.

The company’s strategic focus lies in delivering solutions that can genuinely enhance operational efficiency and are designed to be impactful across multiple industries. Swades AI is a firm believer in harnessing AI breakthroughs into tools that people can actually use.

For more insights into their projects and initiatives, visit their website: [Swades AI](https://www.swades.ai/).
